Name: Perpetual Cocktail
Ingredients: 2.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Delicate berry fruit and chocolate influences herbal vinous vermouth.
History: Recipe adapted from Hugo R. Ensslin's 1917 book Recipes for Mixed Drinks (pape 26): " ½ Italian Vermouth ½ French Vermouth 2 dashes Crème de Cacao 4 dashes Crème Yvette Shake well in a mixing glass with cracked ice, strain and serve. "
Nutrition: One serving of Perpetual Cocktail contains 143 calories
